World Blitz Championship 2024 LIVE Updates, Day 1: Carlsen in action; Arjun, Caruana in joint-lead; Vaishali with perfect score - Sportstar
summary:
World Blitz Championship 2024 LIVE Updates, Day 1: Carlsen in action; Arjun loses to Caruana; Vaishali continues to lead in Women’s

Publication Date: December 31, 2024

Source: Sportstar

The World Blitz Championship 2024 has kicked off in Wall Street, New York, featuring 17 Indian players, including prominent matches where Magnus Carlsen shines while Arjun Erigaisi suffers a defeat to Fabiano Caruana.

  • Magnus Carlsen has recorded multiple wins on Day 1 of the tournament.
  • Arjun Erigaisi faced a critical loss against Caruana.
  • Vaishali secured her position at the top of the Women's section.
  • Highlights include engaging matchups between top players from around the world.
“Ah, crushing. Arjun’s winning run also comes to an end after he resigns…”

This year's championship showcases some of the best chess talent globally, with significant competition anticipated in both the open and women's sections.
newTitle: World Blitz Championship 2024 Day 1: Carlsen, Arjun, and Vaishali Highlights
